fields.description: Type of payoff document. Return as 'Payoff Statement' (title case) for standard payoffs, not all caps like 'PAYOFF REQUEST'.

Type of loan (e.g., conventional, FHA, VA). You can infer that the loan type is 'HELOC' if document refers to a 'line of credit' or similar statement which would imply a HELOC in the context of a title or section heading. Disambiguate this from 'credit line' or something not referenced in a title which does not imply a HELOC. Use judgement like a loan processor. Return exact text 'Not Present' when field is absent or you are not COMPLETELY SURE that the loan is a HELOC.
The text you used to determine if the loan type was HELOC. Otherwise, 'Not Present'. ONLY PRESENT FOR HELOCs.
Date through which the payoff amount is valid. Return in MM/DD/YYYY format exactly (e.g., 05/21/2025), never ISO format. Return exact text 'Not Present' when field is absent.

Text describing when the payoff amount is valid through. Provide the full text including terms and conditions for which payout amount is valid. Include the FULL valid text including these conditions that impact the date and not overall cost. Return the exact text found, or leave empty/null if this information is not present in the document.
Daily interest amount. Return with currency symbol and decimals (e.g., '$76.39'). Return exact text 'Not Present' when field is absent.
Number of charges or fees. Return as a number. Return exact text 'Not Present' when field is absent.
Full legal name(s) of the borrower(s). Return exact text 'Not Present' when field is absent or not applicable.
Whether disbursement notes include borrower information. Return 'TRUE' or 'FALSE' in uppercase exactly.
Name of the lending institution. Return exact text 'Not Present' when field is absent or not applicable.
Complete lender address including street, city, state, ZIP, and country on separate lines. Format as multi-line address. Return exact text 'Not Present' when field is absent or not applicable.
Name of the beneficiary. Return exact text 'Not Present' when field is absent or not applicable.
Full address of the beneficiary. Return exact text 'Not Present' when field is absent or not applicable.
Complete property address including street, city, state, ZIP, and country on separate lines. Format as multi-line address. Return exact text 'Not Present' when field is absent or not applicable.
Full name of the bank for wire transfer. Include DBA information if relevant. Return exact text 'Not Present' when field is absent or not applicable.

Complete wire transfer instructions. Return all associated fields, including but not limited to Mortgagor, Account Numbers, Loan Numbers, or anything found in this section. You must include ALL information. Return exact text 'Not Present' when field is absent or not applicable.
Complete address for wire transfers including street, city, state, ZIP on separate lines. Format as multi-line address. Return exact text 'Not Present' when field is absent or not applicable.
Complete address for overnight deliveries including street, city, state, ZIP on separate lines. Format as multi-line address. Return exact text 'Not Present' when field is absent or not applicable.
